# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug1370.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug1370.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir COMMAND Xyce bug1370.cir )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;transline")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug1370.cir)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug1370.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.prn bug1370.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug1370.cir)
